item.description:
Bring your appetite - there will be PIZZA!!!  Please RSVP, so we can get a good head count for the PIZZA.

TITLE: Schwab's "The Edge" Platform demo & TECHNICAL ANALYSIS FOR TRADERS by KEN JENNINGS, CHARLES SCHWAB

DESCRIPTION: Ken will demonstrate Charles Schwab's new platform "The Edge" and also discuss technical analysis techniques.

BIO: KENNETH JENNINGS KENNETH JENNINGS is the Active Trader Relationship Manager for Charles Schwab in New England and upstate New York. He joined Charles Schwab in January of 2000 after graduating from The Ohio State University in Columbus. While working with some of Schwab's most active investors, KEN worked towards and received his Master's Degree in Finance from the University of Colorado in Denver. He held a variety of roles at Schwab before moving to the Boston area in March of 2005. As an Active Trader Relationship Manager, KEN facilitates workshops covering topics like risk management, technical analysis, and trading strategies while also supporting local clients and employees regarding Schwab's Active Trading services.

PRE-MEETING Announcement: Bob Podd will conduct a pre meeting (now call Trader's Plans, formerly called the Tiger's Group) starting at 5:30.  He will continue with the track of:

        How to use technical analysis to trade in news driven Markets

For questions, see Bob Pod at bpodd@softwareresults.com. The meeting is the same room as the 7:00 meeting.

This is a free meeting. There is no membership required.
item.name: Boston Investor's Group November Meetup
